content:
I can no longer build my IG guide (not even locally). I get this error
[get] Getting: http://build.fhir.org/org.hl7.fhir.igpublisher.jar [get] To: E:\Ruby25-x64\IG_Publisher\PHD\src-generated\org.hl7.fhir.igpublisher.jar [get] Error opening connection java.io.FileNotFoundException: http://build.fhir.org/org.hl7.fhir.igpublisher.jar

I am guessing the publisher has moved and I will need to change something in the 'bat' file. I am using Lloyd's framework.

see https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179294-committers.2Fannounce/topic/Change.20to.20IGPublisher.20location its all in there

Figured I missed it. But thanks, just what I needed!
